mapper.insert: insert into user (id, code, email, fix_phone, id_card, mobile_phone, `password`, qq_num, real_name, sex, user_type) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fixPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qqNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update user set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fix_phone = #{fixPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq_num = #{qqNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, code, email, fix_phone, id_card, mobile_phone, `password`, qq_num, real_name, sex, user_type from user where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, code, email, fix_phone, id_card, mobile_phone, `password`, qq_num, real_name, sex, user_type from user
